mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.qiye_name as qiyeName ,a.qiye_address as qiyeAddress ,a.qiye_photo as qiyePhoto ,a.qiye_phone as qiyePhone ,a.qiye_email as qiyeEmail ,a.qiye_types as qiyeTypes ,a.qiye_content as qiyeContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM qiye a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.qiye_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.qiyeName},'%')
and a.qiye_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.qiyeAddress},'%')
and a.qiye_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.qiyePhone},'%')
and a.qiye_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.qiyeEmail},'%')
and a.qiye_types = #{params.qiyeTypes}
and a.qiye_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.qiyeContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
